text_block_list.text:
It'd been a while since I'd officially became a trainer at 
Tracen Academy. And today―
(gorogorogorogorogoro…!!)

I was in an awful state, and ended up 
stumbling my way in to the hospital.

The result of my exam was that it was just simple food 
poisoning. I'm glad it was nothing serious… but, on the way home 
with medicine in hand―

text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text:
For now… congratulations on being 
discharged, Mejiro Ardan. But, please 
make sure you avoid anything too strenuous.

text_block_list.name: Nurse
text_block_list.text:
You're probably sick of hearing this by now, but 
make sure you don't overwork yourself! Make sure 
you do your stretches and cooldowns properly!

text_block_list.name: Doctor
text_block_list.text:
Repeated fractures and sprains will shorten the 
life span of your legs. Always be cautious with 
your judgement. Do you understand?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I'm very much aware of it. 
This time too, thank you very much for taking care of me.

text_block_list.name: Elderly Maid
text_block_list.text:
My lady Ardan. 
The car to pick you up has arrived.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Granny, thank you very much. 
…Well then everyone, I will be off.

text_block_list.name: Nurse
text_block_list.text: Take care! …Seriously, don't push yourself too hard!!

That seemed like an awfully strict conversation 
between the doctors and that Uma Musume wearing 
the Tracen Academy uniform — Mejiro Ardan.

The next time I saw her was while riding the bus 
back to Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Hmmmmm～… Ah!! 
Ardan-saaaaaaaan!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Chiyono O. 
So you were waiting for me again, I see.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, since you were being discharged today! 
I'm glad that you were safely able to return to school…! 
Congratulations, Ardan!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, thank you, as always.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
But, I seem to have made you wait out in the 
cold. You haven't gotten too cold, have you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
At the very least, once we return to the dorms let me make 
you some tea. I just happen to have some because a 
visitor brought some―

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Huh?… That senpai, she was admitted to the hospital again?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Ah- if I remember correctly, before the previous 
Selection Race she was injured or wasn't feeling 
too good and had to withdraw right beforehand.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Right before getting started she had to withdraw? 
And she's done it several times? …Eh? Isn't that bad? 
Normally, you'd be in a panic, right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Wait a minute! You over there…!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Chiyono O. 
…Thank you, but, I don't really mind.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: But, Ardan-!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Well, it's all true though.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Uu…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Alright, Chiyono O. Before we get too cold, 
let's return to the dorms.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Aaah… Mejiro Ardan is it? 
Let's see…

For some reason it was bothering me, so I asked Tazuna about her. 
When I did―

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
…It's just as you heard, she's someone that is rather frail and 
gets injured easily. Ever since she's enrolled, she's been 
admitted to the hospital several times.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Because of that, even though she's trying to get started, she's 
had to withdraw from several Selection Races, and has had to 
take many days off from training―

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
As a result, she's never been scouted and has yet to debut. 
And the evaluations of other trainers… hasn't been too positive either.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
I… believe she's someone with talent. 
She's an Uma Musume from the famous Mejiro 
family, so she definitely has the potential.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
It's just that her body is a bit fragile… On top of that, there's 
her older sister as well.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Even as a new trainer, I'm sure you're familiar with the name. 
One of the Mejiro family's most prominent — Mejiro Ramone.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Winning her debut race with a 20-length margin, and during her 
junior-year recording several times approaching that of the 
'Super Car' Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: On top of that, being the first one to ever earn the 'Triple Tiara'.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
There's no shortage of anecdotes, about the glory of the 
outstanding and strong older sister… and Ardan being 
overshadowed, but still chasing after her.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Ardan herself, is truly doing her utmost but…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: At this rate, next time will probably be the last-

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Ah, no! I'm sorry, this is just my speculation. Um―

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
…But if she's caught your interest, please try 
approaching Ardan, Trainer!

Even with that frail body, chasing after her outstanding 
older sister's shadow, an Uma Musume with a gentle laugh. 
Mejiro Ardan―
…Tomorrow, I decided I'd go and see what her situation was.
